permission: Any user can use these commands

commands.descriptions: Link to our support server: suggestions, bugs, complaints or partnerships with creators
Submit a suggestion for improvement or new command. The 'url_image' and 'color_hex' parameters are optional
Report a bug. The 'url_image' and 'color_hex' parameters are optional
Return a list of available commands.
Add buttons with weblinks to messages
Send a message formatted in an embed. The 'url_image', 'color_hex' and '@member' parameters are optional
Add reactions to messages
Convert the last channel message to embed. You can convert other messages using the message ID in the "messageid" field
Return your user information.
Creates a link to the channel by the informed ID If ID is empty, creates a link to the current channel.
Returns the average bot response time.
Returns the result of a mathematical operation.
Search for the definition or classification of a word in Portuguese [br] or English [us].
Sort a number between a range (eg. sortnum 1-100)
Sort a word among others. Don't forget to separate with a comma! (ex. grape, pear, apple)
Translate a word into Portuguese[br].
Send a message to the staff channel.
Creates an invitation link to another bot.
Saves the current time of any activity
Analyze current activity and return total time
